text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
…Ah!! Thank goodness, I finally 
found you…!! I've been wanting 
to talk to you this entire time!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You know, I'm really, really grateful! 
That's the main thing I wanted to tell you!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you, so many people came to 
my concert… Hehe, it feels like a dream!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko is an Umadol, so I planned this 
birthday concert with the idea of giving 
all my fans a present, even on my own 
birthday, but…

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
To have such a wonderful stage prepared 
for me like this… in the end, Falko got the 
biggest present!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But you know, now it's time for me to 
return the favor!! Watch, Falko is going 
into SERIOUS MOOOODE!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to make this the AB-SO-LUTE 
best birthday concert! With all the effort 
the future top Umadol Falko can give 
RIGHT NOW!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You can have a front row seat, okay? 
Make absolutely sure you watch 
Falko sparkle!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Well then — I'm off to perform♪
